Sentencas: Mathematical models of an indirect internal reforming solid oxide fuel cells (IIR-SOFC) fueled by methanol were developed to analyze the thermal coupling of the internal endothermic steam reforming with exothermic electrochemical reactions and predict the system performance.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions and gas flow patterns on the system performances of IIR-SOFC fueled by methanol

Sentencas: The simulations indicated that IIR-SOFC fueled by methanol can be well performed as autothermal operation, although slight temperature gradient occurred at the entrance of the reformer chamber.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions and gas flow patterns on the system performances of IIR-SOFC fueled by methanol

Sentencas: Sensitivity analysis of five important parameters (i.e. operating voltage, reforming catalyst reactivity, inlet steam to carbon ratio, operating pressure and flow direction) was then performed.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions and gas flow patterns on the system performances of IIR-SOFC fueled by methanol

Sentencas: The increase of operating voltage lowered the average temperature along the reformer chamber and improved the electrical efficiency, but it oppositely reduced the average current density.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions and gas flow patterns on the system performances of IIR-SOFC fueled by methanol

Sentencas: Greater temperature profile along the system can be obtained by applying the catalyst with lower reforming reactivity; nevertheless, the current density and electrical efficiency slightly decreased.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions and gas flow patterns on the system performances of IIR-SOFC fueled by methanol

Sentencas: By using high inlet steam to carbon ratio, the cooling spot at the entrance of the reformer can be reduced but both current density and electrical efficiency were decreased.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions and gas flow patterns on the system performances of IIR-SOFC fueled by methanol

Sentencas: Lastly, with increasing operating pressure, the system efficiency increased and the temperature dropping at the reformer chamber was minimized.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions and gas flow patterns on the system performances of IIR-SOFC fueled by methanol

Sentencas: It was also found that IIR-SOFC with co-flow pattern (co-flow of air and fuel streams through fuel cell) provides higher voltage and smoother temperature gradient along the system compared to that with counter-flow pattern due to the better matching between the heat supplied from the electrochemical reaction and the heat required for the steam reforming reaction.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions and gas flow patterns on the system performances of IIR-SOFC fueled by methanol

Sentencas: Hence, the performance of IIR-SOFC fueled by methanol can be maximized by applying co-flow pattern and operated with high operating pressure.
Titulo: Effect of operating conditions and gas flow patterns on the system performances of IIR-SOFC fueled by methanol
